trans-unit.source: Represents the <xref uid="langword_csharp_<EncryptionProperty>" name="<EncryptionProperty>" href=""></xref> element used in XML encryption.
This class cannot be inherited.
The EncryptionProperty class encapsulates the `<EncryptionProperty>` element defined by the World Wide Web Consortium XML Encryption specification located at http://www.w3.org/TR/xmlenc-core/.

Use the EncryptionProperty class to provide additional encryption information related to the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedData> and <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedKey> elements.
For example, use this class to specify a time stamp.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptionProperty"></xref> class.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptionProperty"></xref> class using an <xref href="System.Xml.XmlElement"></xref> object.
An <xref href="System.Xml.XmlElement"></xref> object to use for initialization.
The elementProperty parameter is .
The property of the elementProperty parameter is not "EncryptionProperty". -or- The property of the elementProperty parameter is not "http://www.w3.org/2001/04/xmlenc#".
Returns an <xref href="System.Xml.XmlElement"></xref> object that encapsulates an instance of the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptionProperty"></xref> class.
The GetXml method returns a representation of the `<EncryptionProperty>` element.
An <xref href="System.Xml.XmlElement"></xref> object that encapsulates an instance of the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptionProperty"></xref> class.
Gets the ID of the current <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptionProperty"></xref> object.
The ID is used to reference the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptionProperty> object from another location.
The ID of the current <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptionProperty"></xref> object.
Parses the input <xref href="System.Xml.XmlElement"></xref> and configures the internal state of the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptionProperty"></xref> object to match.
The LoadXml method configures the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptionProperty> object to match the state of an <xref:System.Xml.XmlElement> object.
An <xref href="System.Xml.XmlElement"></xref> object to parse.
The value parameter is .
The property of the value parameter is not "EncryptionProperty". -or- The property of the value parameter is not "http://www.w3.org/2001/04/xmlenc#".
Gets or sets an <xref href="System.Xml.XmlElement"></xref> object that represents an <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptionProperty"></xref> object.
An <xref href="System.Xml.XmlElement"></xref> object that represents an <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptionProperty"></xref> object.
The PropertyElement property was set to <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.

The <xref:System.Xml.XmlElement.LocalName*> property of the value set to the PropertyElement property is not "EncryptionProperty". -or- The <xref:System.Xml.XmlElement.NamespaceURI*> property of the value set to the PropertyElement property is not "http://www.w3.org/2001/04/xmlenc#".
Gets the target of the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptionProperty"></xref> object.
The target of the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptionProperty"></xref> object.
